FuncDef: The display mpls te link-administration srlg-information command is used to view the SRLG to which an interface belongs.
CLIs: display mpls te link-administration srlg-information interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> }

ParaDef.Info:
The SRLG group number to which the interface belongs.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 4294967295.

Display all SRLG group on the interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te link-administration srlg-information interface gigabitethernet 1/0/0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the SRLG attribute is configured in the interface view, you can run the display mpls te link-administration srlg-information command to check the configuration.
